seed_pair.target: We don't want to interrupt the story.

S0031: querías | querías hablar | hablar | hablar conmigo | conmigo | esta noche
you wanted | you wanted to speak | to speak | to speak with me | with me | tonight
S0032: did you want | did you want to show me | to show me | something
S0033: cuánto tiempo | cuánto tiempo llevas | llevas aprendiendo | aprendiendo español | español
how long | how long have you been | have you been learning | learning Spanish | Spanish
S0034: él | no quiere | no quiere estar | estar silencioso | cuando | otras personas | están aquí | cuando otras personas están aquí
he | doesn't want | doesn't want to be | to be quiet | when | other people | are here | when other people are here
S0035: ella | no quiere | no quiere leer | leer | leer nada | nada | esta tarde
she | doesn't want | doesn't want to read | to read | to read anything | anything | this afternoon
